title: President sends letter regarding oath of CM Punjab, to PM Secretariat
content:
According to President House, earlier, the Lahore High Court order dated April 22, 2022 in the Writ Petition No. 24320/2022 had also been sent to the Prime Ministerâ€™s Secretariat on April 22, 2022 for necessary process as per the Constitution and law.
